title: Am I eligible for compartmental exams if I fail in 2/5 subjects in theory portion of 12th CBSE board but got good marks in internals and practical exam?
comments:
Agar google pe dekho to yeh likha ha

Students who failed in any one of their five subjects are eligible to appear in CBSE Compartment Examination. Candidate having 6 subjects and got compartment in two subjects can appear in any one of the two compartmental subjects.

Ya to physics de paoge ya sirf chemistry dono dene he
To jab agla board hoga unke sath de paoge jitna mujhe dhyaan h


Agar apke 5 main subject h aur aap do me fail h sorry ab 12th fail ha

ohk thanks for commenting ..

btw do you know about NIOS on demand exams ?
They will pass you don't worry. Speaking from experience

light_cleaned_title: Am I eligible for compartmental exams if I fail in 2/5 subjects in theory portion of 12th CBSE board but got good marks in internals and practical exam?
light_cleaned_selftext: I messed up my physics and chemistry exam (just solved 2-3 questions ) . I did passed in the internals and might score between 23-28 in practical of all subjects (60+ in fine arts and 15+ in English ). So am I eligible to give compartment exam for these two subjects ? I have in total 5 subjects (PHY,CHEM,BIO,ENG,FINE ARTS).My english exam went great and I'm pretty confident for bio and fine arts .  [This is confusing me](https://preview.redd.it/lst6u6gsm2na1.png?width=1758&format=png&auto=webp&v=enabled&s=389c2ad0bda4c25fb472d015295b91c7144711ea)  [What's the difference between these two?](https://preview.redd.it/3ls7gzeum2na1.png?width=1666&format=png&auto=webp&v=enabled&s=dbf2b7cdf0fce41aa6f53908e393aa36495bf04d)
